name: Loki and Sylvie's Disastrous Date
description:
Follow Loki and Sylvie through their misadventures across time and space. Will these dates crumble faster than the planet above Lamentis-1? The choice is up to you!

...What could possibly go wrong?

A fan visual novel developed by Team Sylkiworks.

  • 3 date destinations
  • 9 endings 
  • 3 CGs
  • Optional Choice Hint Indicator (Can be turned on from "Preferences" menu)
  • 14k words / ~2 hours of playtime
  • Rating: T
  • Mild violence & cursing, slight flashing
